programme.title: Halsey The Road To Motherhood
programme.desc: Living with bipolar disorder, singer Halsey went from suicidal and living on the streets to becoming a Grammy-nominated artist. Now, Halsey opens up about their painful condition, and how AGAINST ALL ODDS they were able to live their dream life of becoming a mother.

programme.title: Janet Jackson Breaks Her Silence
programme.desc: Janet Jackson reveals the haunting story of how she was treated unfairly in Hollywood after the Super Bowl mishap with Justin Timberlake.

programme.title: Jane Fonda Vs. The US Government
programme.desc: Actress Jane Fonda took the public by surprise when she was photographed overseas for her activism. When Nixon found out, Jane became target enemy #1 and the country called her “despicable”. Why was the President suspicious of Jane’s motives? And how did Jane Fonda fight back?

programme.title: Dwyane Wade s Fight to Support his Kids
programme.desc: This is how Dwyane Wades custody battle from hell against ex-wife forced him to show up BETTER.

programme.title: Dave Bautista Breaking Out of the Box
programme.desc: Desperate to make a change in his life, Dave Bautista left his brutal childhood behind to become a wrestler. But when the WWE denied Dave from pursuing his biggest dream, everything started breaking down. Why did Dave walk away from a successful career in the WWE? And why did John Cena make everything worse?

programme.title: Vin Paul Forever Family
programme.desc: When the explosive news of Paul Walker’s death surfaced, it shocked the world. The Fast and Furious franchise would never be the same - and Paul’s daughter, Meadow Walker, was left without a father. So why did Paul leave her with Vin Diesel? And what important lesson on parenting did Paul teach Vin before he passed away?

programme.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Rebuilding Family
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger was forced to be tough at an early age. Abused by his father, Arnold tried to bury his painful past by putting all of his energy into bodybuilding. When he started a family with his wife, everything appeared perfect to the outside world... Until Arnold was publicly exposed for cheating on his wife and destroying his family. Why did Arnold cheat? And how far back do the lies go?

programme.title: Ben Affleck Jennifer Lopez Together Again
programme.desc: Prior to getting back with JLo, Ben Afflecks life had been nothing short of TRAGIC... Why was Jennifer Garner completely fed up with him? And how did Ben almost DESTROY his family?

programme.title: Kourtney Scott Family Breakdown
programme.desc: It took 10 YEARS of fighting and heartbreaks for ﻿Kourtney Kardashian to FINALLY walk away from her ex, Scott Disick. She then fell MADLY IN LOVE with musician Travis Barker, and that made Scott absurdly JEALOUS! Why did Kourtneys family CONTINUE to be supportive of Scott despite his toxic behavior?

programme.title: Diana Camilla A Princess Betrayed
programme.desc: Princess Diana was adored by the outside world. But at home, she SECRETLY dealt with deep sadness and betrayal: Her husband, Prince Charles, was having an affair with Camilla Parker. What happened when Diana finally confronted his mistress?

programme.title: Naomi Campbell Nelson Mandella Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Mark Ruffalo Jennifer Garner Support In Friendship
programme.desc: One night, Mark Ruffalo woke up SOBBING from a terrible nightmare. He dreamed he received a medical diagnosis FROM HELL, which later became true! His resilience was put to the test. But why did he choose to hide the tragic news from his wife? And what did co-star Jennifer Garner think of him on the set of "13 going on 30"?

programme.title: The Fear in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to pay for his son’s chemotherapy, retired boxer Isea ‘Ice’ Jackson is forced to face off against the most dangerous man alive - undefeated champion Kurt ‘The Mountain’ Backstrom. If Jackson wins, he’ll earn enough money to save his son. But if Backstrom wins, Max could die. How far would you go to save your child’s life?

programme.title: Chris Gardner CEO of Happyness
programme.desc: Goalcast EXCLUSIVE! ﻿﻿Remember the movie "The Pursuit of Happyness" starring Will Smith? Some may not know that Chris Gardner is the REAL person behind Will Smiths character.﻿﻿ But until now, a BIG part of his story was never told. In this Goalcast Original, Chris finally opens up to the world about WHAT HAPPENED to him after losing the love of his life.

programme.title: The Boy with the Broken Brain
programme.desc: Jim Kwik went from learning-challenged to becoming a world expert in speed-reading and memory improvement. A leading authority on learning, Jim has trained everyone from Fortune 500 CEOs like Elon Musk to Hollywood superstars, Will Smith and Hugh Jackman. If knowledge is power, then learning is your superpower, and Jim shows you how to find it.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: The Clock is Ticking
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, this father immigrated to America and worked his whole life so his daughter would have greater opportunities than he did. He had her life mapped out but she wanted to pursue a completely different path. After an unexpected blowout, her dreams were crushed. What happened next is not what you’d expect.

programme.title: Sarah Prout Toxic Love
programme.desc: Relationship advice inspired by the story of Sarah Prout and the 10 years of abuse she suffered. In this video Sarah Pout raises awareness about domestic violence, whether its emotional abuse, physical abuse, or both. She was brave enough to leave her abusive, toxic relationship, and that courageous decision changed her life for the better. We hope her courage inspires you, and remember you are stronger than you think!

programme.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
programme.desc: Navy SEAL David Rutherfords tragic tale of a fallen comrade shows you how to live the "Team Life".

programme.title: Broke But Not Poor
programme.desc: Through tales from both childhood and adulthood, John Hope Bryant explains the difference between being broke and being poor, ending his story with a powerful metaphor meant to help us better choose our paths.

programme.title: Real Stories Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: UFC legend Frank Shamrock has a backstory you probably wouldn’t expect from one of the toughest fighters alive... As a kid, Frank Shamrock was the farthest thing from being a UFC legend—he was a criminal. He was put into Juvenile Detention Centers for all sorts of crimes. He wanted a way to escape the scary, torturously abusive home he grew up in, where his stepfather would make him do things that broke him physically and emotionally. But his tough, painful, and wildly unpredictable journey to becoming a UFC legend shows us success isn’t something that happens instantly, it’s a slow gradual process that’s reserved for those who don’t give up when things get hard.

programme.title: Lisa Nichols Let Your Light Shine Bright
programme.desc: World-renowned motivational speaker and bestselling author Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how to never dim your light for the sake of others and let yourself shine regardless of what those around you might think.

programme.title: Great Day to be Alive
programme.desc: Eloquent and charismatic, Ian Humphrey shares the journey of his amazing, inspiring life, as he travels through comas and foster homes, prisons and a rebirth in gratitude.

programme.title: Jay Shetty Lesson from a Famous Failure
programme.desc: In this candid speech, former monk and internet guru Jay Shetty reflects on his sacred tenure and finds the one universal lesson that he learned through his years of struggle.

programme.title: A Lost Husband
programme.desc: This stay-at-home mom has had it enough with her husband taking her for granted. When an unexpected turn of events puts him in a bad spot, he has no choice but to face the extent of his arrogance.

programme.title: Private Jets 401 k s and Financial Fitness
programme.desc: Ric Edelman explores how the costs of flying in a private jet apply to everyday situations like leasing a new car. Ric also gives advice about 401(k)s and speaks with fitness guru Denise Austin about the discipline needed to achieve financial fitness.

programme.title: How to Retire ASAP - and Where to Save to Get There
programme.desc: "Ricochet J in CO and her husband want to retire as soon as humanly possible. Are they on track? Should they save their surplus funds to a brokerage account or a solo 401(k)? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 505 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, Micah in SD wonders whether having a $40,000 a year pension is basically the same as having a million dollars in bonds, according to the four percent rule. What do Joe and Big Al think? Barney & Betty will be in the 12 or 22 marginal tax bracket, but their effective tax rate will only be between 10 and 12.4, so how much should they convert to Roth? Are they asking the right question? And finally, Joe and Big Al spitball on ways to ensure that Amir in NM has the maximum possible retirement income to last him to age 90 or 95."

programme.title: Financial Planning at Every Age Retirement Planning for Millennials Gen-X Baby Boomers
programme.desc: "Whether youre a Millennial just getting started, a Gen-Xer juggling lifes competing demands, or a Baby Boomer eyeing the finish line, the stakes are high when creating financial security for your future. Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA guide you through the financial strategies and goals each generation should implement that can mean the difference between a retirement of scarcity or abundance."

programme.title: Aging Populations and the Retirement Crisis
programme.desc: "A record number of people are turning 65, but many face retirement with little to no savings. In this episode, we examine the global aging population, the widening retirement savings gap, and the financial challenges millions must overcome to secure their future."

programme.title: The Simple Solution To Financial Fraud... But..
programme.desc: "Banking has a fraud problem, thats not new, and it costs clients billions of dollars every year. We are all so used to this now that its not even shocking anymore but there is now a simple solution that can eliminate this problem while actually saving the banks money. However, banking executives want you to forget about this solution as quickly as possible or just convince you that it wont work. Regular viewers of the channel will know I hate dragging out the answer to a simple question for the sake of watch time, so the solution is just to force bankers to work from home, where they actually have less oversight from managers and authorities. A recent study by the European Journal of Financial Management found that FIVE TIMES less likely to engage in financial misconduct when working from home. There are two reasons why this works so well and three infuriating reasons why executives wont let it happen. The first reason is simply because everything done from home goes on a digital record. In America banks are not allowed to delete most records for five years, and thats not just financial transactions and signed contracts, it also includes internal files like emails, meeting minutes and instant chat messages between employees. A billion dollars lawsuit was recently settled with major banks that didnt put effective measures in place to stop their employees sending messages via encrypted messaging platforms like WhatsApp that dont leave the required records. There was no way to tell if these bankers were talking about their plans for the weekend or conspiring on an insider trading scheme. Laws vary in other countries but there is always one record thats impossible to keep track of and that is in person conversations. There are three types of conversations that happen in banks with alarming frequency that make this a serious problem. So its time to learn How Money Works to find out how we found a simple solution to fraud and why we are going to pretend it doesnt exist."

programme.title: From Adaptive Intelligence to Decentralized Skies at Korea Blockchain Week 2025
programme.desc: Live from Korea Blockchain Week 2025, join us at The Edge of Show as we explore how blockchain and AI are redefining the next frontier of technology and real-world innovation. Host Josh Kriger sits down with Shaw Walters, Founder of Eliza Labs, to unpack the concept of Adaptive Intelligence, a new approach to merging AI and crypto through agent-to-agent economies, generative token networks, and autonomous systems that learn from user behavior. Then Robin Wingardh, co-founder of Wingbits, shares how his team is decentralizing flight tracking data, partnering with major airlines, and building a blockchain network that rewards contributors worldwide. A deep dive into how AI, data, and decentralization are merging to transform industries—from autonomous agents to global aviation.

programme.title: Spotlight - Eden Energy
programme.desc:
Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future.
EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water
Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.desc: Barbara is about to travel to Spain for an exhibition of her paintings. The night before starting her journey there is a hurricane and she has to stay in a nightclub until the morning. During the night she comes into contact with different people who have a variety of conflicts and interests. She is drawn into this microcosm which seems to be a reflection of Cuban society today.

programme.title: Interview with DJ Black

Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 12
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 14
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: The Big Wave
programme.desc: Sneevil and Biggs set off a Smightynami wave that threatens to wash away Smightyland. Dude has to ride the big one and save the day.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Sundar Bana Hulk
programme.desc: A customer who is a doctor comes to the caf carrying a box filled with test tubes. He accidentally leaves a test tube behind by which Sundar happens to drink it. Sundar now starts having episodes where he turns into a muscular, scary version of himself for a brief while (like Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde). He bullies Chair Raja and Basha during these episodes but then the potion starts to wear off. Sundar continues to fake it but finally has to bear the brunt of his bullying.

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: CHOCOLATE CHAI
programme.desc: Chai Raja wants to swish up a new kind of recipe for teatime in order attract more customers. Sundar who has snuck in a tasty bar of chocolate is trying to sneak a bite as he goes about his chores in the kitchen. However thanks to his clumsiness or an altercation with Basha, Sundars chocolate bar ends up in Chai Rajas experimental kettle. Chai Raja is extremely angry at first but when he gives it a taste, he realizes that hes hit the jackpot. The customers cant get enough of the chocolate Chai and by word of mouth (shown comically like a Chinese whisper leading right upto the a famous chef) , news of his creation reaches the ears of a famous Chef. The Chef turns up at hotel Kelifornia and on tasting it wants the recipe for himself. He offers Chai Raja a lot of cash but Chai Raja refuses. But the Chef not ready to give up, decides to steal the recipe. He ropes in Basha and tries to get Sundar too to spill the beans. Its utter confusion as Sundar muddles up the Chefs ploy and Basha gets distracted by the fries far too often for the Chefs good.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Wheres Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: ZoonicornsIntheZooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Gummys Little Pet.
programme.desc: Gummy gets a small pet fish with a HUGE appetite – and he, Harry and Kala soon find that feeding this ever-ravenous, ever-growing pet is pretty much a full-time job!

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: LetGo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: The Tin Soldier
programme.desc: The brass soldier, GoGo who entered the playroom where the toys lived has no leg. A soldier who feels homogeneity with a ballerina who always stands with one leg up. But the soldier is caught up in a clown trap and falls out of the window.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Mewmews Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: A4 Paper
programme.desc: Blank paper? No problem, Hepi and Briko are full of ideas

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: Royal rift
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a banjo and they find themselves in a fantasy castle where a King and a Queen keep fighting about everything. The Twins will play a song that will bring peace in this land.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: LOCKED UP
programme.desc: After his Mutant Octopus is defeated, Negu decides to attack the Guardians himself with a Mutant Meerkat. The Guardians capture him, and the Elders have Negu locked up near the Magic Fort. The Mutant Meerkat tunnels into the fort so Negu can steal the Glove of the North – his plan all along. The Guardians rush to stop him, but Negu ties them up with his Lasso of Doom – until Pai gnaws through it and temporarily EATS the Glove of the North!

programme.title: Tin Can
programme.desc: Tin Tin Tin, Hepi and Briko have an unbelievable idea for these tin cans

programme.title: Fix it!
programme.desc: The twins visit a world where everything is falling apart, where they meet the frantic "fix-it team

programme.title: The tale of a toad
programme.desc: The twins help a toad who is rejected because he is so ugly.

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Too Cute
programme.desc: Biggs transforms himself into a cute baby animal to blend into Leilas Zoo. Now disguised, he can easily help Sneevil steal the Earth Stone. But all the sweet attention from Leila makes Biggs question his loyalty.

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Friday finds a stray puppy, but its Fred and Brains who fall in love with it, paying more attention to the pooch than to him. When he starts to suspect the puppy of being more evil than he seems, they don’t believe him. Indeed, the puppy turns out to be a brilliant alien mastermind, intent on global domination.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: Royal Egg – Ugly Duckling
programme.desc: Everybody knows the story of the UGLY DUCKLING: the adventures and misadventures of a little swan that is born far from his family and is mocked and rejected by everyone. But nobody knows how the swan’s egg ended up in a duck’s nest. In this episode, SANDRA and FO have to resolve this mystery, having been called out by the parents of the UGLY DUCKLING, two swans who are the KING and QUEEEN of the birds. SANDRA will manage to thwart a plot to kill the “Ugly Duckling”, the prince of birds.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: The Bigger They Are
programme.desc: Odessa feels overwhelmed by her art project, then in the Zooniverse she helps clear the Rainbow Road of a giant bubble – and learns that big problems can become small, manageable ones. You dont have to do everything all on your own and, asking for help can be one of the best tools for problems solving.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Float Fault
programme.desc: Fred thinks that if Brains’ design is chosen for building the class float in the school parade, she will be more popular. Her design wins, but is too complicated to build, and Fred takes the blame. On parade day, Friday transforms into her design—a working Destroyer that wins “Best Special Effects.’

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Day At The Museum
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want a pleasant day at the museum. But there are three surprise visitors – the trio. And as they enter, the museum runs haywire. The mummies come to life, the swords fly around and Don is running for his life. How will this all end???

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: La asistente
programme.desc: En su nuevo trabajo, Lucy descubrirá el amor, la mentira y secretos que podrían poner en riesgo su vida.

programme.title: La asistente
programme.desc: En su nuevo trabajo, Lucy descubrirá el amor, la mentira y secretos que podrían poner en riesgo su vida.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Los Lisovsky descubren el secreto de Sasha y la echan de su casa.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Boris descubre que Sasha es su hija y todo se desmorona a su alrededor.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha da a luz en prisión y Nina se lleva al bebé para dárselo a su hija Katia.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Private Snafu; Volume 1-1943
programme.desc: Introducing Private Snafu, the nation's worst soldier and his various versions in different branches of the armed forces

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: popeye's 20th anniversary (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films at a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', 'Bing Crosby', 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, Popeye instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Customers Wanted 1939
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: Fireman's Life, A-1933
programme.desc: Fireman's Life

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Tramp, Tramp, Tramp the Boys Are Marching-1924
Sinbad the Sailor 1935
programme.desc: Sinbad battles a band of pirates at sea and on a tropical isle. A giant bird rescues him, and he ends up back on his ship with the pirates' treasure

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Private Snafu - Fighting Tools -1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost
programme.desc: Unhappy with the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After scaring several others by accident, Casper befriends two young children

programme.title: Here's Lucy 1974: Season 6; Episode 19; Milton Berle Is the Life of the Party
programme.desc: Chastized for her boring parties, Lucy wins a celebrity charity auction, enlisting Milton Berle as a guest for her next party.

programme.title: The General 1926
programme.desc: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines

programme.title: Charlie Chaplin's A Busy Day-1 914
programme.desc: A jealous wife is chasing her unfaithful husband during a parade, after he starts to flirt with a pretty woman

programme.title: Laughing Gas- 1914
programme.desc: Charlie pretends to be a dentist though he is only his assistant. When a patient can't stop laughing from the anesthesia Charlie knocks him out with a club. He is sent to the drug store, gets in a fight with a man who (after a brick in the face) becomes another patient, and pulls the skirt off the dentist's wife (who is out walking). At one point Charlie pulls a tooth (the wrong one) using enormous pliers

programme.title: The Gorilla 1939
programme.desc: When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
Songs and Saddles 1938
programme.desc: A traveling musician tries to prevent a rancher from losing his property to a swindler.

programme.title: Rock River Renegades 1942
programme.desc: Recently elected Marshal Luke Graham falls under suspicion when he's unable to discover the local band of rustlers, which are really led by Jim Dawson, who is also trying to steal Grace Ross, daughter of the local newspaper editor.

programme.title: The Rider of the Law 1935
programme.desc: Bob Marlow is sent undercover to an Arizona town where an outlaw gang, comprised of the six Tolliver brothers, have taken over the town and terrorizing the citizens. He comes to town, posing as an Eastern dude, and, through a series of incidents manages to get rid of three of the brothers, mostly through their own ineptness. The remaining brothers decide to get-while-the-gettin'-is good, rob the bank and head for the Mexican border. But Bob isn't far behind

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem 1956
programme.desc: In The Star of Bethlehem, the timeless Nativity story is brought to life in a reverent and beautifully crafted short film. Through vivid visuals and heartfelt narration, the journey of Mary and Joseph, the shepherds in the fields, and the guiding star that led the Wise Men to Bethlehem are retold with warmth and devotion. With its simple yet powerful storytelling, this classic reminds audiences of the wonder, hope, and faith at the heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Joseph and His Brethren 1961
programme.desc: In Joseph and His Brethren, the timeless biblical story comes to life in a sweeping tale of betrayal, faith, and forgiveness. Beloved by his father but despised by his jealous brothers, Joseph is sold into slavery and carried off to Egypt. Rising from servant to trusted advisor through courage and faith, he faces temptation, injustice, and trials that test his spirit. With powerful performances and epic scope, this historical drama retells one of the Bible’s most inspiring journeys of resilience and redemption.

programme.title: The Miracle on 34th Street 1955
programme.desc: In The Miracle on 34th Street, a kindly old man hired to play Santa Claus at Macy’s insists that he is the real Kris Kringle. As his warmth and generosity touch everyone around him, skeptics take him to court to prove his claim. Blending holiday charm, heartfelt performances, and a timeless message about faith and belief, this television adaptation of the classic story reminds audiences that sometimes the greatest miracles are the ones we choose to believe in.

programme.title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives 1933
programme.desc: In The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives, a heartwarming Merrie Melodies cartoon, a lonely boy is taken in by Santa on Christmas Eve and whisked away to a magical shanty filled with toys, music, and holiday cheer. As the night unfolds, the child discovers the joy of belonging and the true spirit of Christmas. With lively animation, whimsical gags, and a touching message, this Depression-era short captures both the hardship and hope of the season.

programme.title: The Great Rupert 1950
programme.desc: In The Great Rupert, holiday magic comes in the form of an unexpected hero—a clever little squirrel! When a down-on-their-luck vaudeville family moves into a new home, they discover that Rupert, a trained squirrel, has a knack for showering them with good fortune. With Jimmy Durante adding warmth and humor, this heartwarming comedy blends laughter, music, and a touch of Christmas wonder into a charming tale of hope, luck, and the unexpected ways happiness finds us.

programme.title: The Great Adventure 1953
programme.desc: In The Great Adventure, Western hero Lyle Talbot rides into a tale of courage and frontier survival. When lawless forces threaten to tear apart a quiet settlement, a lone rider steps forward to defend the innocent and face down the ruthless outlaws. With sweeping landscapes, tense gunfights, and classic Western grit, this adventure delivers action and honor on the open trail.

programme.desc: La historia de un humilde hombre de negocios, Quan (Jackie Chan), cuyo pasado erupciona en una venganza desenfrenada después de que su hija muera en un atentado terrorista motivado por aspectos políticos. En su búsqueda de los terroristas, Quan se ve atrapado en un juego del gato y el ratón con un político irlandés que colabora con el gobierno británico (Pierce Brosnan), cuyo pasado podría tener algo que ver con los asesinos.

programme.title: Guest Steven Christopher
programme.desc: Singer, songwriter, and producer Steven Christopher joins the show to talk about his new single, “Don't Wait,” how to not be toxic, creativity in dark times, and more.

programme.title: The Crew has an Honest Conversation about HBCUs
programme.desc: We all love our HBCUs, but truth be told, there are some issues about HBCUs that need to be addressed. In this special edition of City Limits, HBCU grads (Starr, Yonathan and J. Hall) share their personal experiences while attending Howard University and Hampton University, two of the nation's top HBCUs.

programme.title: July 18, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for July 18, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guests A'Jzae Dominique, Victoria Reese, and Brittney Joelle
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by A'Jzae Dominique, Victoria Reese, and Brittney Joelle, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Marcelle Lashley-Kaboré
programme.desc: Girls with Knowledge founder Marcelle Lashley-Kaboré is building social entrepreneurs from the U.S. to Africa, breaking barriers and helping to build wealth. Learn about her mission, journey and Emmy winning success.

programme.title: The Kids Know
programme.desc: Thomas and Melody meet up with Vegan Evan, a leading young animal activist!

programme.title: What Your Spicy Vegans Eat in a Day!
programme.desc: This video will make you declare... I'll have what they're having. What they eat in a day? A feast!

programme.title: The Land Of Ahimsa
programme.desc: The granddaughter of a Gandhi freedom fighter returns to India pleading for a renewal of Ahimsa!

programme.title: Ranch Rescue - Storming to Safety!
programme.desc: A Texas ranch turned vegan sanctuary faces a deadly storm—can they save their beloved animals ?

programme.title: Susan Pratt Reveals Cactus Magic!
programme.desc: How to make Cactus Soy Curls, inspired by Ave's chic cactus bag

programme.title: Fascinating Fashionista!
programme.desc: Emma Hakansson is an ethical fashion leader who makes her case with captivating style!

programme.title: S3E4 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S1E10 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: The Devil's Fairground
programme.desc: Starring Justin Duncan, Gerald Crum, Mercedes Peterson and John Charles Dickson. The Stars of two competing and colliding paranormal television shows converge on an abandoned haunted amusement park which ends up being the epicenter to hell. They are now all trapped - in an all out war against pure evil...

programme.title: Whisper
programme.desc: A young Nurse is assigned to look after a patient in a remote location in the English countryside. As the night continues she finds herself terrorized by an unseen force that is connected with her patient...

programme.title: Ouija Hosts
programme.desc: Presenters of paranormal TV show "Ghost Hosts" are filming in an abandoned haunted building as part of a Halloween special. The stories surrounding the horrifying ghosts of the mansion are about to become reality...

programme.title: Jack y Jill
programme.desc: Una adaptación terrorífica de la canción infantil Jack y Jill. Un grupo de amigos afligidos por una pérdida reciente se reúnen sólo para descubrir que están siendo perseguidos por Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Krampus 2: El Diablo Regresa
programme.desc: Cinco años después del asesinato de su esposa y la desaparición de su hija, el ex policía Jeremy Duffin es traído de vuelta para ayudar en la caza de un monstruo de Yuletide que castiga a los niños que han sido «traviesos». A medida que el monstruo se vuelve más errático e impredecible, Jeremy descubre la verdad sobre la desaparición de su hija y el destino que le ha deparado una fuente improbable. ¿Podrá Jeremy acabar finalmente con la pesadilla del monstruo navideño que ha aterrorizado a este pueblo durante años?

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Poltergeist Americano
programme.desc: Horribles visiones atormentan a Taryn cuando ella, su hermano y sus compañeros de universidad se mudan a una vieja e infame casa. Entonces, sus sangrientas alucinaciones se vuelven demasiado reales...

programme.title: Bendecida Por La Muerte (El Regreso de la Güera)
programme.desc: LA GÜERA DEFENDIENDO LOS TERRITORIOS, LOS ENEMIGOS QUIEREN ACABAR CON ELLA , METIENDOLA PRESA , ELLA TERMINA CON LOS QUE LA TRAICIONAN Y LLEGA A SUS TERRITORIOS PROTEGIDA , DONDE ELLA OBTIENE SU POSICION EN SUS TERRENOS DE MICHOACAN Y ACABA CON SUS ENEMIGOS.

programme.title: Chito Cano "El Gallo de Guerrero"
programme.desc: Chito, un destacado policía, despliega todos sus poderes para atrapar a los líderes de la mafia del sur. Para evitar problemas, la mafia intenta sobornarlo, pero él se niega, por lo que lo incriminan y se ve obligado a esconderse.

programme.title: Compa Me Gusta Su Vieja
programme.desc: En esta pelicula completa de narcos te presentamos la historia de dos hombres y una mujer que desde niños formaron una amistad muy fraternal, incluso hicieron un pacto de sangre de ser amigos por siempre. Enrique siempre lo ha tenido todo, dinero y comodidades. Fernando por su parte siempre ha carecido de dinero. Ademas Enrique tiene la suerte de contar con el amor de Maite. Descubre lo que pasara cuando Fernando le confiese a Enrique que le gusta su vieja. no te la pierdas.

programme.title: Abrazos No, Balazos
programme.desc: Un hombre es injustamente acusado y encarcelado por 20 años por engaño de su esposa, quien lo acusó falsamente de un crimen. Tras su liberación, el hombre buscará venganza contra su ex esposa y aquellos que lo traicionaron.

programme.title: Codón Es Una Máquina
programme.desc: Dos amigos se reúnen para planear la creación de una película con un equipo de producción filmando el proceso, dos cuarentones con problemitas están muy decididos a hacer la famosa película de la que llevan años hablando. Se vienen tan arriba que hasta ya graban el making of... y hasta están haciendo un casting, aunque no tienen ni guión ni puñetera idea de lo que van a rodar. Y lo peor: no sospechan que están en las manos de un loco peligroso.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Canon: Fidelidad al Límite
programme.desc: Mariana de 35 años, es una arquitecta que trabaja y es socia de un importante despacho de arquitectos, está casada con Julián de 40 años, quien es corresponsal de guerra. Está enamorados, felices, con relación sexual cotidiana. Son padre de dos hijos de 14 y 17 año. En el juego sexual, Julián menciona que no le importaría la infidelidad a condición de estar enterado del hecho con detalles.

programme.title: Mi Pequeña Pesadilla
programme.desc: Después de la terrible experiencia y la pérdida de sus amigos, Heather se ve obligada a regresar al Hotel Fear donde Travis se prepara para sus próximas víctimas. Heather debe luchar una vez más.

programme.title: Morirse En Domingo
programme.desc: Julio Salas muere tras una larga enfermedad, pero es domingo y su familia por dificultades económicas se ve forzada a contratar los servicios de una modesta agencia funeraria. El dueño al hacerse cargo del cadáver lo vende a la universidad. El sobrino descubre el negocio y exige que el cuerpo de su tío acabe en el horno crematorio, enamorándose de paso de la hija del incinerador
